Name: tgrelid
Description: The table this trigger is on

Name: tgname
Description: Trigger name (must be unique among triggers of same\n table)

Name: tgenabled
Description: True if trigger is enabled (not presently checked\n everywhere it should be, so disabling a trigger by setting this false does not work reliably)

Name: tgisconstraint
Description: True if trigger implements a referential integrity\n constraint

Name: tgconstrrelid
Description: The table referenced by an referential integrity\n constraint

Name: tgnargs
Description: Number of argument strings passed to trigger\n function

Name: tgargs
Description: Argument strings to pass to trigger, each\n null-terminated
